channel.title: Newb coder need help
channel.description:
i need help with 4 things. am new at coding so i dont know much 1. how to add obj i searched for it but all the threads were erased 2. adding npc, and drops too 3. making shops 4. how to make xp rate what ever you want it.
please and thank you

item.title: Newb coder need help
item.dc:creator: @liverare liverare
item.description:
@liverare wrote:

Ok, to modify a spell so it dose not 1 hit KO just search the spell name or a key word in the spell.
Just change the hit rate.
Im sure you will recognize it.

To add items just search
makeGlobalObject

you will come across something like
coordx| coordy| objectid| direction| type| note = // anival at skills
makeGlobalObject(2523, 4774, 2783, 0, 10); // anival at skills

(i made this)

Read full topic
